banner.btext: Kuliah ke luar negeri? Salak Ed siap membantu anda!

frontText.textsec: Plan your future with Salak Ed

second.textp1: Salak Ed is a college and high school education consultant specializing in study abroad programs in Canada, the United States, Australia, and the United Kingdom.
second.textp2: Our team is not only based in Indonesia but also in the United States and Canada, allowing us to assist students not only before departure but also during settlement and adaptation in their destination countries.

forth.p: We believe every people deserve to have a meaningful life by pursuing the best education that the world can offer to.
forth.p2: 25+ years accumulated experience in the industry
forth.p3: We have partners in major Canada provinces to help students get settled in Canada
forth.p5: First-hand experience to study, work, and live in Canada and United States
forth.p6: 100% employment rate through program career coach
forth.p7: We understand it is not easy to live abroad, we are here to help students to get the best living experience

fifth.des1: Discuss your dream and plan to study abroad with our international counselor. This includes country of destination, program interest, GPA, career goal, and also your budget.
fifth.des2: Find whatâ€™s the right fit for you and your future. Explore your school and program options. We will provide the university/college/school information including the yearly tuition, employment rate, requirements, deadlines, and application fee information.
fifth.des3: Our international counselor will ask you to provide documents for school admission, such as: copy of passport, school transcript, English proficiency test, diploma certificate, reference letter.
fifth.des4: We will submit your school application along with the application fee payment to the school.
fifth.des5: Your wait is over, congratulations you have been accepted to your dream school! You will receive the letter of acceptance from the school.
fifth.des6: Pay the tuition fee according to the LOA directly to the school.
fifth.des7: Apply for student visa. With your request, our counselor will assist you in the visa application process.
fifth.des8: We will help you to get the best deals with the help of our partners abroad.
fifth.des9: You almost there! We will guide you from A to Z what you need to prepare before departure, what to expect when you arrive, and also some tips and tricks for settling the first week in your new life!

contactFront.heading: Contact Us
contactFront.subheading: Need some guidance? We've got your back! Our team is eagerly waiting to assist you on your educational journey.

subContact.p1: Leave your message, now! Our Consouler will get back to you as quickly as possible.
subContact.p2: You can also visit our office to discuss more, ore we can visit you (Jabodetabek area only) for your convenience. Alternatively, we can arrange a video call via Zoom, Gmeet, or any digital platforms you like.

from.heading: Send us a message
from.name: Name
from.messagep: Let us know how we can help you?
